attributes.action: Require that all long-distance Intercity trains feature a full buffet/resturant car rather than a trolley service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too many services have had their buffet cars scrapped and replaced by a trolley service. Passengers prefer buffets over trolleys because:

Convenience -  they can purchase refreshments when they need them, rather than waiting for the trolley to come round.

Range of products - a buffet can sell a wider range of goods than a trolley, including hot snacks. 

Quicker - with buffets, its just a matter of queuing for a few minutes at most, whereas a trolley can take more than an hour to do a full round of the train.
